data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 3, Kevin Stott signals a Seattle throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Seattle.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bradley Wright-Phillips of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 11, Goal! Raul Ruidiaz gives Seattle a 1-0 lead in Seattle.
Free kick Los Angeles.
In the minute 14, Los Angeles's Mark Anthony Kaye breaks free at CenturyLink Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Seattle have a goal kick.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 15, Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 18, Jordan Morris (Seattle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Los Angeles drive upfield and Bradley Wright-Phillips gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seattle defender.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 26, Mark Anthony Kaye (Los Angeles) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Kevin Stott awards Seattle a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Kelvin Leerdam (Seattle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Free kick Los Angeles.
In the minute 35, Seattle to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Cristian Roldan (Seattle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 38, Kevin Stott awards Seattle a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dejan Jakovic is replacing Danilo Silva for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 40, Seattle to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Los Angeles's Brian Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 42, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Seattle.
At CenturyLink Field, Mark Anthony Kaye has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Seattle drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Kevin Stott signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Raul Ruidiaz has recovered and rejoins the match in Seattle.
In the minute 45, Kevin Stott blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Raul Ruidiaz for Seattle who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Kevin Stott signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
Brian Schmetzer is making the team's first substitution at CenturyLink Field with Will Bruin replacing Raul Ruidiaz.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 47, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Jordan Morris puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Nicolas Lodeiro.
In the minute 49, Goal! Jordan Morris extends Seattle's lead to 3-0.
Joao Paulo instrumental with a fine assist.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 53, Seattle push upfield but Kevin Stott quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Seattle.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 57, Los Angeles's Diego Rossi is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 60, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-1 through a strike by Diego Rossi. .
Jose Cifuentes with an assist there.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 62, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Important block from the Los Angeles defence as Jordan Morris fires in a strike for Seattle.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Shane O'Neill for Seattle has been booked by Kevin Stott and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Free kick Seattle.
In Seattle, Joevin Jones of Seattle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 66, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a second substitution, with Adrien Perez replacing Tristan Blackmon.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 68, Kevin Stott signals a Seattle throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In Seattle Los Angeles's Adrien Perez is caught offside.
In the minute 69, Latif Blessing (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Kevin Stott.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Seattle.
Kevin Stott waits before resuming play because Joevin Jones for Seattle is still down.
In the minute 72, Joevin Jones, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Nouhou Tolo is the substitute for Seattle.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Seattle.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Bradley Wright-Phillips with Danny Musovski. This is the third substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
Alex Roldan is replacing Nicolas Lodeiro for the home team.
The home team have replaced Joao Paulo with Jordy Delem. This is the fourth substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Brian Rodriguez with Christian Torres.
Francisco Ginella is replacing Mark Anthony Kaye for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 81, In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 86, Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a fifth substitution, with Xavier Arreaga replacing Jordan Morris.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In the minute 89, Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Los Angeles drives forward and Jose Cifuentes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kevin Stott will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Kevin Stott awards Seattle a goal kick.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Seattle.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
